# ðŸ“œ abadpour

ðŸ“œ `abadpour` is an [`@ai`](https://github.com/kamangir/bluer-ai) plugin for my CV/resume, in two versions: [compact](./pdf/arash-abadpour-resume.pdf) and [full](./pdf/arash-abadpour-resume-full.pdf).

## installation

```bash
pip install abadpour
```
